messages.message: Uploading and digitizing a 20 page file was quick but it took quite a long time for it load afterwards so I could select it
@Udit can you help with network tracking this?
Let me try reuploading and seeing if it happens again with devtools open.
:thank_you:
This means the digitization is still going on, I think. Loading the files shouldn't be too slow

@Udit
At this time - this means digitization is still on going
Yah, the network tab just shows that the "flow" or digitization was in progress, nothing weird
But previously, the screen would remain on the first view where it says digitizing, now it skips that?

@Subash
We can keep the centre notification stack (upload + digitization progress bars) intact for this ?
@Udit this could be an interesting document for us to test … can you please share it (if possible)
yeah this is a UX change -- we change the remove that screen
This is by designed
the spinner means things are still running
Stripe insights report, converse is good at answering questions about it
Ok, then this shouldn't be a bug or anything, just changed UX
yep
@Rakesh don't change the UX back -- this is the desired behavior (spinner spinning for files that are in progress).

When its loading, it says "select a file" or something as the empty state, but when its digitizing the file cannot be selected. Maybe the empty state can be changed for the case where nothing can be selected?
yes that is fine - but the centre whitespace is the one (which is confusing since no file is ready yet at that time) - I can quickly sync with you.

Just want to echo that I found it confusing, after uploading a large file but before I could select it, for the prompt to be “Select a file” when there was no file for me to select yet. Especially when the visible sidebar was the Conversation list, so it wasn’t intuitive that I needed to click “New conversation” to see that my file was still processing/had a spinning icon.
Good feedback, we can improve the `Select a file to review` text copy i
